name: Boat Battle (SpyderGames)
description:
This game is a simple test of staple game elements in Java.  It is little more than a test to see if I could create a "functioning game" in Java.  It includes elements like sound and game file saving that are critical in games.  If for some reason you like the game, than great, but it really isn't meant to be anything good.

Controls:

WASD to move

X to attack boats that you are directly on top of

Z to save the game.
